fields.headline: Dungeon Siege 3 - teaser trailer
fields.bodyText: Yes, it's only a teaser but I'm looking forward to Dungeon Siege 3. Mainly, it has to be said, because it is coming out on 360 and PS3 - formats that would seem to be perfect for a game like this, especially when playing online. Anyway, what do you think? Looking forward to Dungeon Siege 3?
